author: BE AMAZED
description:
Here is the story of Desmond Doss, a true American soldier and a WWII medic who displayed immense courage. His heroic acts during the Battle of Okinawa, where he saved lives without bearing arms, are truly inspirational. Doss's unwavering faith made him a true hero.
Suggest a topic here to be turned into a video: http://bit.ly/2kwqhuh

title: He Fought (& Won) A War Without a Weapon
